title: Drawing, "Design for Textile-Pillow Series No. 5, Series #2160 (A,B,C)", 1966
signed: In graphite lower margin inside stamped office address block: ALEXANDER GIRARD / ARCHITECT / P.O. BOX 2168 SANTA FE, NEW MEXICO
inscribed: At lower right in graphite inside an office address stamped block along right edge:   No.2160 (A,B,C) PILLOW SERIES No.5 / DATE:11-9-66 / SCALE: FULL SIZE / BY: LESTER / JOB NO. / DRAWING NO.
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
description: Circle at top of sheet, two rectangles at center and below, linear square with small square in center

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Design for Textile-Pillow Series No. 5, Series #2160 (A,B,C)", 1966.Graphite on white tracing paper. Gift of Alexander H. Girard. 1969-165-414.
